text: ♪ Three little kittens ♪
♪ They lost their mittens ♪
♪ And they began to cry ♪
♪ Oh mother dear we sadly fear ♪
♪ Our mittens we have lost ♪
♪ What lost your mittens ♪
♪ You naughty kittens ♪
♪ Then you shall have no pie ♪
♪ Meow meow  meow meow  we shall have no pie ♪

♪ Three little kittens
they found their mittens ♪
♪ And they began to cry ♪
♪ Oh mother dear see here see here ♪
♪ Our mittens we have found ♪

♪ What found your mittens
you darling kittens ♪
♪ Then you shall have some pie ♪
♪ Meow meow meow meow  we shall have some pie ♪

♪ Three little kittens
put on their mittens ♪
♪ And soon ate up the pie ♪
♪ Oh, mother dear we greatly fear ♪
♪ Our mittens we have soiled ♪

♪ What soiled your mittens
you naughty kittens ♪
♪ They began to sigh ♪
♪ Meow meow meow meow  our mittens we have soiled ♪

♪ Three little kittens
they washed their mittens ♪
♪ And hung them out to dry ♪
♪ Oh mother dear look here look here ♪
♪ Our mittens we have washed ♪

♪ What washed your mittens
you're such good kittens ♪
♪ I smell a rat close by ♪
♪ Meow meow meow meow  we smell a rat close by ♪
